titleStmt.title: To the honourable, the knights, citizens, and burgesses in Parliament assembled, propositions for changing the excise, now laid upon coffee, chacholet, and tea, into an imposition upon those commodities at their importation

notesStmt.note: Wing T1451A (dated 168-?). For date, see Journals of the House of Commons X, 321.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
